nodes.text: Essovin was a Trandoshan female pilot who flew in the New Republic's Flare Squadron as Flare Leader. Along with the rest of the squadron, Essovin accompanied Commander Wyl Lark to investigate a damaged Imperial convoy. Essovin later participated at the Battle of Jakku but was killed.
Essovin first appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
